Site Params # Optional Footer copyright = 'Name' [params] # True if the header must appears also in the homepage (default: True) showHeaderOnHomepage = true #Â Google Analytics G-Tag (optional) googleAnalytics = "G-XX00000" # True if you want to use Twemoji (optional) twemoji = false # Optional text for 404 text.
